snippet: A genre of serious fiction deploys strong characters dealing with realistic scientific issues.
abstract: Katherine Bouton essay notes that 'lab lit,' genre of fiction that depicts scientists as central characters and portrays realistic scientific concepts, is gaining in popularity.
lead_paragraph: A genre of serious fiction deploys strong characters dealing with realistic scientific issues.
